<figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"><img data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480" src="https://41.media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_npsry5Jxux1rr2wit_540.jpg" alt="image"/></figure><p><br/></p>

<iframe src="http://www.twitch.tv/cantwearhats/embed" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" height="378" width="620"></iframe>

<p><a href="http://www.twitch.tv/cantwearhats"><b>CantWearHats</b></a> is a variety streamer from the United Kingdom. Although he

plays a large variety of games he has a weekly KSP stream on Thursdays,

and his stream is definitely worth a follow if you’re looking for a

stream with a bit of a calmer pace.</p><p> We do wonder why he can’t wear hats.</p>
